name: Earth Magic Spells
description:
Adds 6 new adventure spells for Earth magic

Dead Luck
Death Call
Dwarven Luck
Herald Of Death
Hold Ground
Power Of Stone
author: Heroes III Modding Community, Aphra

czech.name: Kouzla magie země
